title: Despite No Evidence of Black Lives Matter Involvement, #BLMKidnapping Trending on Twitter

organizations.name: twitter despite no evidence of black lives matter involvement

text:
Despite No Evidence of Black Lives Matter Involvement, #BLMKidnapping Trending on Twitter by Alex Griswold | 9:24 am, January 5th, 2017 
Despite no evidence that the assailants in the livestreamed Chicago torture and kidnapping were affiliated with or supporters of the Black Lives Matter protest movement, #BLMKidnapping began trending on Twitter Thursday. 
In the video, the assailants can be heard shouting ‚ÄúF*** white people‚Äù and ‚ÄúF*** Donald Trump,‚Äù but not any slogans affiliated with Black Lives Matter. Still, the hashtag began trending after apparently being kickstarted by alt-right figure Mike Cernovich . If Trump must ‚Äúdisavow‚Äù every random Internet troll, then #BlackLivesMatter must disavow every crime or else they support it. #BLMKidnapping 
‚Äî Mike Cernovich üá∫üá∏ (@Cernovich) January 5, 2017 
Others on the right and alt-right soon followed, racking up thousands of retweets. Chicago hate crime law. This is clearly a hate crime. Why have Chicago police refused to label it that? #BLMKidnapping pic.twitter.com/1sCB580JW5 
‚Äî Paul Joseph Watson (@PrisonPlanet) January 5, 2017 #BLMKidnapping was an opportunity for the left‚Äôs redemption. Reporters just needed to tell the truth. Instead, they sealed their casket. 
‚Äî Steven Crowder (@scrowder) January 5, 2017 The silence from the usual progressive race-baiting outlets over #BLMkidnapping is deafening. 
‚Äî Sargon of Akkad (@Sargon_of_Akkad) January 5, 2017 The Truth about the #BLMKidnapping you won‚Äôt see on the mainstream media: https://t.co/KMKI2zqm4V 
‚Äî Mark Dice (@MarkDice) January 5, 2017 Remember the #blmkidnapping every time some journalist lies about my white advocacy organization and calls it a hate group. 
‚Äî Richard üê∏ Spencer (@RichardBSpencer) January 5, 2017 I don‚Äôt know what‚Äôs more disgusting, the video itself or the silence from the social justice warrior leftist media #BLMKidnapping 
‚Äî Deplorable Melissa (@sweetatertot2) January 5, 2017 Who in the name of hell raised the #BLMkidnapping goons? 
‚Äî Adam Baldwin (@AdamBaldwin) January 5, 2017 
Some like Glenn Beck also blamed the movement without using the hashtag. Others hijacked the hashtag to challenge its premise. All of the white people in the #BLMKidnapping tag aren‚Äôt nearly as concerned about the white boy as they are with demonizing black people. 
‚Äî busan babe‚Ñ¢ (@melaninbarbie) January 5, 2017 Was it a hate crime? YES Are they gonna pay for what they did? YES Is it because of BLM? NO #BLMKidnapping
